snippet: The murders at the Sikh temple in Wisconsin are a reminder of our hate crimes problem. States and cities need to increase the enforcement against bias-motivated violence.
abstract: Editorial argues that recent murders at a Sikh temple in Wisconsin are a reminder that states and cities need to increase their enforcement against bias-motivated violence.
lead_paragraph: The murders at the Sikh temple in Wisconsin are a reminder of our hate crimes problem. States and cities need to increase the enforcement against bias-motivated violence.
